message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. I believe it holds great value for those who appreciate its unique features. For this exceptional item, I propose a price of $200. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your response.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $120. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $150? I believe this would still allow me to acquire the product while staying within my financial limits.
